name: AssetManager
description: Asset Manager - The entry to manage all bridged tokens from Nervos chain The owner of this contract should be transferred to the gnosis multi-sig wallet of Force Bridge committee when the initializing is done. All tokens recorded in this contract should be authorized to mint and burn by the this contract.

functionDecorators.name: addAsset
functionDecorators.description: Add a new asset to the asset manager.

functionDecorators.name: burn
functionDecorators.description: Burn an asset and get the locked amount back on Nervos chain.

parameterDecorators.name: token
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the token to burn.

parameterDecorators.name: records
parameterDecorators.description: The mint records. This function should only be invoked by the gnosis multi-sig wallet of Force Bridge committee.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeAsset
functionDecorators.description: Remove an asset from the asset manager.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
